title: Can receive but not send Emails
content:
Hi, all of a sudden I can no longer send Emails. I get a long period of hanging after sending then a message saying password not incorrect.

This was going on for a couple hours when it was working(able to send messages);

Then just now just to double check before posting this(see the actual what the actual fail message is saying),

I can now send messages again - but now it doesn't ask me for a password first, where before I needed one. It will just send the Email.

This is very strange behavior going on as I didn't do any restarting of the computer - only closing Thunderbird.(which didn't do anything for a couple trys).

Is it possible there is some background updating going on? Or something else?

Insights are appreciated.
creator: jaiy

title: Can't import from Thinderbird (Linux) dektop to Thunderbird Mobile on Android
content: I just learned about Thunderbird Mobile for Android and installed it from F-droid. Everything seemed to go okay until I tried to import my settings from the desktop (Thunderbird 128.7.0esr (64-bit) running on SolydK Linux 12 (Debian Bookworm)). I lined up the QR code (I think) and pressed the Done button, but it just dumped me back to the Getting Started screen without accessing my settings at all.

title: Thunderbird keeps freexing/crashing everytime I open it. There is no way to use it. I'm using 128.7 version in Windows 11
content: Hi, I've been using Thunderbird for at least two decades. In january (aprox) it kept freezing after using it for a while. It was a pain but I closed it (the hard way because it did not respond) and then reopened it. I managed to use it this way until today. Today it froze at starting it up. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling, I've tried opening it up without extensions, I've tried installing an older version. Nothing has worked thus far. Please please help me. I have to be able to read my older messages and to see my folders.
creator: nadia.t

title: Very long connecting time on first launch
content: I'm on Thunderbird (128.6.0esr (64-bit)) on Fedora/GNOME. I've noticed, that whenever I launch Thunderbird, it takes several minutes (!) where it says "Connecting to mail.myserver.com" in status. I'm using my own postfix/dovecot server with imap and I don't have this problem on Thunderbird Windows for instance, where it connects right away on startup. After the initial slow connection, it works just fine, when I manually trigger to scan for new messages (instantly). I tried literally any option within Thunderbird to fix that, without any success. It seems to be some trouble with resolving / dns or probably ip6/ip4, but then again, why would it work normally after the long connection time in the beginning? Any clue what might be the problem here?
creator: admin952

title: copy some emails & folders across from laptop to Desktop Windows 10 Computers
content: Hi,Please assist I have had down for approximately 5 weeks,My Windows 10 Desktop & I use to save all from my Desktop all Thunderbird Emails & Folders & some programs that are still on my Desktop & I have used my Laptop Since Microsoft(for which Stuffed up the Settings on the Desktop Computer} have promised that on Sunday,They will install a new addition & save Thunderbird Settings prior to them causing the Desktop to Shut down & They cannot even restart it I have a Back up Disc for Both Computers,But being a little slack & Time wise,The Last Back up of C: was on the1st week in January 2025 As Soon As THey Re-do my Desktop,I need to copy all the emails & Folders from my Laptop ONLY SINCE THE DESKTOP Computer has been Down Please assist Thanking you Darryl

title: Theme tree
content:
Dear Support Team,

After the last update, I noticed that the function “Show in topic tree/Im Themenbaum anzeigen" no longer appears in Thunderbird.

This feature was essential for me as it allowed me to organize my emails efficiently. Without it, Thunderbird is much less practical for me.

Can you please let me know if it is possible to restore this function? If there is a setting or menu field that I can activate, I would be very grateful for brief instructions.

Versionnumber: 128.6.0esr (64-Bit) Mac

Thank you very much for your support!!

title: Messagerie Thunderbird
content:
Bonjour, 

Depuis quelques je n'arrive plus à envoyer des messages de ma messagerie; je les reçois mais impossible d'en envoyer, transférer ou autre. Un message dans un cadre s'inscrit:  
L'envoie du message a échoué.

Une erreur est survenue lors de l'envoi de l'e-mail. Le serveur e-mail a répondu: i8lRtsEsbP3WU StartTLS obligatoire. StartTLS mandatory.OFR103_199 {199]. Veuillez vérifier que votre adresse e-mail dans les paramètres du compte est correcte et essayer de nouveau. 

 Voilà ce qui s'affiche. Pourriez vous, s'il vous plait me donner une solution, conseil, etc.., pour pouvoir à nouveau utiliser cette messagerie Thunderbird. Cordialement, merci encore, Jean.
creator: jmvincens

title: Kann keine Emails empfangen
content:
Hallo alle, seit heute Früh können wir keine Email mehr empfangen. Kurz vor acht kam die letzte und kurze Zeit später kam keine mehr an. Dies sollte eigentlich so sein, da wir aus unserem Buchungsprogramm immer eine Kopie bekommen.

Auch jetzt später im Selbstversuch kommen keine Mails an. Versenden ist problemlos möglich, jedoch können diese dann nicht im Ordner Gesendet kopiert werden.

Wir haben zwei Mailkonten. Einmal über 1blu und einmal Jimdo und natürlich in dieser Zeit keine veränderungen vorgenommen.

Vielleicht kann jemand helfen was das Problem sein könnte.
creator: svhermann84

title: Mozilla-sloupce-změna nastavení výchozího rozložení
content: Dobrý den, lze prosím změnit výchozí nastavení rozložení sloupců? Když zadám příkaz "Obnovit výchozí sloupce" sloupce se vždy seřadí v pořadí Předmět-Korespondenti-Datum. Lze toto defaultní rozvržení změnit. Vždy když založím "Nová položka" vytvoří se nová položka, ale s výchozím nastavením sloupců Předmět-Korespondenti-Datum. Zakládám často položky a neustále měním pořadí sloupců, tak jak vyhovuje rozložení mně "Korespondenti-Předmět-Datum" Děkuji za radu. Karel
creator: karel.kozel

title: After virus attack hijacked inbox profile emails. Cannot view or delete.
content:
Hello, I need help. A virus has entered my computer through an infected file. Possibly a trojan. And when Bitdefender antivirus scanned the whole computer, it found viruses. It offered to remove them. I removed them. But after this action, all the emails in my mailboxes became invisible. I can see the subject of the email, but I cannot see what is inside. The email is white. There are no functional buttons to forward or reply to the received mail. Attached files are also inaccessible. It also does not allow me to delete the message.

I can delete emails from my sent profile. I tried reinstalling Thunderbird. It didn't help. I tried moving my inbox profiles to another computer - no help. I have a feeling that there will be some virus file in the profile that prevents the contents of the email from being displayed. Incidentally, I get a similar picture when I have archived an email via the compacting function.

The fact that emails affected by the virus are inaccessible. Newly arrived emails are visible and I can delete them.

I hope that someone else has had a similar situation and knows how to solve it. I would be grateful for your help.
creator: karolistyla

title: Thunderbird does not stay pinned to windows taskbar when it self updates?
content: I keep thunderbird pinned to my Windows taskbar and that is usually where I look for it. Every so often and much mor6e frequently than I like it vanishes from there and I believe that that is when it an update to it arrives. To maintain the state I like I then need to delete the now-dead pinning for the taskbar, find thunderbird afresh and leunch it and re-pin. This is not a terribly new behaviour but the grief threshold in my life has just been passed leading me to ask if this is a thunderbird issue or a windows one and if there is some scheme I can use to keep the application pinned pretty well come what may. This is obviously not life critical but it has been winding me up! Many thanks. Arthur
creator: arthurcnorman

title: TheFancyDress The Best Place for World Book Day Clothes
content:
TheFancyDress is your go-to destination for[[ World Book Day clothes|https://thefancydress.co.uk/collections/world-book-day-costumes]], offering an extensive selection of costumes inspired by beloved literary characters. Whether your child wants to dress up as Harry Potter, Alice in Wonderland, Matilda, The Gruffalo, or the Cat in the Hat, TheFancyDress has a wide variety of outfits to bring these characters to life. Their collection includes classic fairy tale costumes, historical outfits, adventure-themed ensembles, and even modern book character attire.

Not only do they provide full costumes, but they also offer individual clothing pieces and accessories such as capes, hats, glasses, and props to help customize any look. Parents and teachers can find affordable and high-quality options for school events, while adults can also join in the fun with costumes designed for all ages.

Beyond shopping, TheFancyDress features an interactive community forum where costume enthusiasts can share ideas, exchange DIY tips, and discuss their favorite book-themed outfits. Whether you need last-minute inspiration or a unique costume idea, this forum is a valuable resource.

With a vast selection, helpful community support, and high-quality attire, TheFancyDress makes World Book Day an exciting and stress-free experience for everyone!
creator: riskycharles987
